resources.string:
Help

How do I use this?

  1. Target your food (or beverage of course!) with your camera
  2. Hold the "Burn the fat" button at the bottom
  3. Finally eat and drink without remorse!

How does it work?

We harness advanced flash frequency modulation (FFM) techniques (based on current research from the 평양과학기술대학 (Pyongyang University of Science and Technology)) to break down triglycerides in your food.

Using this method, we can effectively reduce the absorbable fat in your food by up to 20%.
